C

checkHallExistence(String) - Method in class Manager.HallManager
This method is to check if the hall based on the inputed hhallCode is already in the hall list before creating a new hall
checkMovieExistence(String) - Method in class Manager.MovieManager
This method checks if a particular movie is already in the list.
classRate - Variable in class Entities.Hall
Class Rates will be stored in a HashMap with Hall Class Type as key and the corresponding rates as key-values.
configureSystem() - Method in class UI
This methods implements all the sub-methods to handle the configuration of different system settings of the MoblimaApp.
createAdmin(String, String, String, String, String) - Method in class Manager.UserManager
Creates a new Admin type User object when given the name, password, mobile number, email and age group.
createCustomer(String, String, String, String, String) - Method in class Manager.UserManager
Creates a new Customer type User object when given the name, password, mobile number, email and age group.
createHall(String, String, String, int, int, int) - Method in class Manager.HallManager
This method creates a new hall based on the inputed configuration of a hall (i.e.
createHall() - Method in class UI
Allows Admin Users to add new Halls to any of the Cineplex owned by Moblima.
createMovieListing() - Method in class UI
Method for Admin User to create new movie listing.
createShowtimes() - Method in class UI
Method for Admin User to create new showtimes for existing movies.
customerLogin() - Method in class UI
Method to validate the authenticity of existing Customer User using their email and password.
customerModule() - Method in class UI
Implements all the different functions for movie-goers ranging from listing and searching movie details, booking of movie tickets, viewing of booking history, listing top 5 ranking of mvoies and writing of rewiew and ratings for movies.
